title: My Google Pixel 5 No longer able to see TV that is on the same network.
content:
My phone is connected to the same network as my television, a Vizio TV. My phone has full internet connectivity via the Wi-Fi, and every other device on the household can connect to the TV and cast on same. The TV does not show up on the network as a castable device, even though another television on the same network does.

WTF?!
